pages.text: Every so often, The Heart goes into bloom! During these weekends, the daily login bonus is upped to 1 Solar, and the lights tick down every half hour instead of every hour.$(br2)This means more coins for everyone, but beware!
It also means the tree's life force drains faster. You don't want to let those lights completely fade...$(br2)$(l:patchouli:economy/heart_death)Next Chapter$(/l)
